name: “Kids Party” Iced Tea
description: We call it “Kids Party” tea because it’s fun and super pretty! You don’t have to be a kid to enjoy this refreshing iced tea!
preparation: In a large jug, mix all ingredients except berries.
Pour into serving glasses, then garnish with a sprig of mint and a few frozen berries to keep the drink cold as well as add flavour.
tips: If you like your iced tea a little sweeter, add a bit of honey or sweetener to the brewed Tea as it cools. Try using sparkling apple juice for a little effervescence.
